net.tinyos.prowler

Class GaussianRadioModel.Neighborhood

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tinyos.prowler.GaussianRadioModel.Neighborhood
  • Enclosing class:
    GaussianRadioModel

    public class GaussianRadioModel.Neighborhood
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores all the node related data the GaussianRadioModel needs, this includes an array of neighboring notes, the static fading and the dynamic strentgh as well for every neighboring nodes plus the entity being transmitted by the node.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node[] getNeighbors() 
      double[] getStaticFadings() 
      void setDynamicStrengths(double[] ds)
      In theory this sets the dynamic fading values for the neghborhood nodes though it should only be used to set the size of this array.
      void setNeighbors(Node[] nodes)
      Sets the neghborhood for this Node, watch the order, as it matters in case of the static fadings too.
      void setStaticFadings(double[] ds)
      Sets the static fading values for the neghborhood nodes of this Node, watch the order, as it matters in case of the static neighbors too.

      • getNeighbors

        public Node[] getNeighbors()
        Returns:
        returns the nodes within radio range of this node.

      • getStaticFadings

        public double[] getStaticFadings()
        Returns:
        returns the static fading data, each value in this array corresponds to the same Node in the Node array.
